Package components

Class Box

java.lang.Object
components.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Box extends Object implements Serializable
This is the class that creates the cells of the grid, it does not inherit from the JavaFX Button class but each object is linked to one
See Also:

    void
    onClickBox()
    It's the method that is called when the corresponding button of the box is clicked It checks if the boxes in general can be clicked, and then if this specific box can be clicked It then sets its pawn variable to the corresponding turn and updates also the pawn object by setting his box Checks if the pawn arrived to his target row or column It then calls the reset method in the Plateau class
    void
    setBot(Boolean isBarrier)
     
    void
    setCanClick(boolean canClick)
    it sets the canClick boolean and changes the color of the button that it gets from the grid using the getNodeByRowColumnInex method in the MainActivity accordingly

  • Method Details

    • onClickBox

      public void onClickBox()
      It's the method that is called when the corresponding button of the box is clicked It checks if the boxes in general can be clicked, and then if this specific box can be clicked It then sets its pawn variable to the corresponding turn and updates also the pawn object by setting his box Checks if the pawn arrived to his target row or column It then calls the reset method in the Plateau class
